name: Big, Big Love
description:
Big, Big Love is my very first video game. I've been working on it for some time, using it to learn how to make video games.

It is a local-multiplayer game where two players shoot hearts at eachother, the concept was inspired by games like Stick Fight and Nidhogg, where the premise is simple: two friends duking it out to beat the other one in single combat!

The game features original music for 5 different stages, all filled to the brim with powerups and obstacles in the way as you fight eachother.
